sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"现代的，当代的"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: modern, contemporary, current, recent, present, up-to-date
means: modern ： 指现代或近代，时期可长可短。也可指新颖、时髦的。
contemporary ： 仅指当今这个时代，不涉及任何过去的时代。但可表示不同的人或物存在于同一时代。
current ： 指目前存在和发生的。
recent ： 表示新近的，最近的，时间的长短依据所修饰的人或物而定。
present ： 是这些词中语气最强的一个。指现在正发生、起作用的。
up-to-date ： 一般用于非正式场合，指很时新、能反映当前的最新发展。

sentence.Network_en: Specialists see various reasons for the recent surge in inflation.
sentence.Network_cn: 专家们认为目前通货膨胀加剧有多种原因。

sentence.Network_en: Recent, more dramatic use of CGI was seen in "Walking With Dinosaurs".
sentence.Network_cn: 在纪录片《与恐龙同行》中可以看到最新的、更加生动的电脑特效技术。

sentence.Network_en: In recent months many conservative politicians have jumped on the anti-immigrant bandwagon.
sentence.Network_cn: 最近几个月，很多保守政客都搭上了“反移民”这班车。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'fresh'): from Latin recens, recent- or French récent

entry.def: A recent event or period of time happened only a short while ago.

example.ex: In the most recent attack one man was shot dead and two others were wounded...
example.tran: 在最近的一次袭击中，一名男子遇袭身亡，另外两人受伤。

example.ex: Sales have fallen by more than 75 percent in recent years.
example.tran: 近几年来销售额下降了75%以上。

means.word_mean: 1. being new in a time not long past;
2. of the immediate past or just previous to the present time;
3. near to or not long before the present;

auth_sentence.content: In recent days he has not been heard from.
auth_sentence.res_content: In recent days he has not been heard from.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In recent days he has not been heard from.

auth_sentence.content: But in recent years that co-operation has broken down.
auth_sentence.res_content: But in recent years that co-operation has broken down.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But in recent years that co-operation has broken down.

auth_sentence.content: China has launched several anti-corruption campaigns in recent years.
auth_sentence.res_content: China has launched several anti-corruption campaigns in recent years.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: China has launched several anti-corruption campaigns in recent years.

sentences.en: Her eyes were red with recent sobbing.
sentences.cn: 她的眼睛因刚哭过而发红。

sentences.en: Things have changed in recent weeks.
sentences.cn: 近几周来情况发生了变化。

sentences.en: The government's control over the newspapers has loosened in recent years.
sentences.cn: 近年来政府已放松了对报纸的控制。

sentences.en: The minister has put a different gloss on recent developments.
sentences.cn: 部长就局势的最新发展作了另一番解释。

jushi.english: What is the most recent news?
Her eyes were red with recent sobbing.
jushi.chinese: 她的眼睛因刚哭过而发红。

jushi.english: In the light of recent discoveries, it may be necessary to revise our previous theory.
jushi.chinese: 考虑到最近的发现,可能有必要修改我们的理论。
